# k8s_capabilities_3scale_net_tenant_v1alpha1_manifest (Data Source)

Tenant is the Schema for the tenants API

## Example Usage

```terraform

  metadata = {
    name      = "some-name"
    namespace = "some-namespace"
  }
}
```
